overview: The video records one of the workshops that the drummer did throughout 2003 in Brazil, and was recorded at the EM & amp; T Music Hall Auditorium in SÃ£o Paulo on November 29. Watching the two hours of the DVD makes it easy to understand why the public and the specialized press consider Aquiles Priester the main Brazilian heavy metal drummer.
title: Aquiles Priester - Inside My Drums
